Uses of Package
com.mimecast.robin.mime

Packages that use com.mimecast.robin.mime
Package
Description
com.mimecast.robin.mime
Everything required for building and parsing MIME messages.
com.mimecast.robin.mime.parts
Represents the different parts of a MIME message.
com.mimecast.robin.queue.relay
Relaying of emails from the persistent queue.
com.mimecast.robin.storage
Manages the storage of incoming emails for the server.
  • Classes in com.mimecast.robin.mime used by com.mimecast.robin.mime
    Class
    Description
    EmailBuilder
    EmailBuilder is a fluent MIME email message generator that constructs RFC 2822 compliant email messages with support for single-part and multipart structures.
    EmailParser
    EmailParser is a standalone MIME email parser that extracts email headers, body content, and attachments from RFC 2822 formatted email messages.
    HashType
    Hash type container.
